item.title: Trump is set to unveil his AI roadmap: Here’s what to know
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Zeff
item.description: Here's everything we know about President Trump's AI Action Plan, a roadmap for the administration's approach to AI.

item.title: Apple launches $19.99 monthly AppleCare One subscription with coverage for three devices
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: Until now, people have had to enroll their Apple devices into separate AppleCare+ plans if they wanted additional coverage for their products beyond the standard warranty.

item.title: Instagram adds new protections for accounts that primarily feature children
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: The update will impact the accounts of family vloggers/creators and parents running accounts for "kidfluencers," both of which have faced criticism for the risks associated with sharing children's lives on social media.

item.title: NetZeroNitrogen wants bacteria to replace synthetic fertilizer on farm fields
item.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
item.description: NetZeroNitrogen's bacteria approach has attracted investors and $6.6 million in seed funding.

item.title: Gupshup raises $60M in equity and debt, leaves unicorn status hanging
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: Gupshup has raised over $60 million in a new round over four years after attaining the unicorn status.

item.title: PayPal taps wallets from China and India to make cross-border payments easier for 2 billion people
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: PayPal is partnering with global fintech companies to let users pay to different wallet systems cross border.

item.title: Apple alerted Iranians to iPhone spyware attacks, say researchers
item.dc:creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
item.description: Researchers say Apple sent out threat notifications to several Iranians in recent months, saying their iPhones had been hacked. Iran is likely behind the attacks.

item.title: Amazon acquires Bee, the AI wearable that records everything you say
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description: Amazon has acquired the AI wearables startup Bee, which makes a bracelet and an Apple Watch app that record your day-to-day life to function as an AI assistant.

item.title: OpenAI agreed to pay Oracle $30B a year for data center services
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: OpenAI was the customer that signed the huge deal that Oracle disclosed last month.

item.title: Rocket Lab’s first hurdle to flying its new rocket is getting it to the pad
item.dc:creator: Aria Alamalhodaei
item.description: Rocket Lab is asking regulators to approve a temporary method to transport hardware to its new spaceport.

item.title: iOS 26 beta 4 arrives, with Liquid Glass tweaks and AI news summaries
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Apple launches iOS 26 beta 4 for developers with updates to Liquid Glass and AI notification summaries. A public beta is expected later this week.

item.title: Threads adds improved content performance metrics for creators
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: The Meta-owned platform says the updates are focused on helping creators build audiences.

item.title: Etsy faces user boycott over ‘Alligator Alcatraz’-branded products
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Etsy users are boycotting the site over its "Alligator Alcatraz" merchandise.

item.title: UK government wants ransomware victims to report breaches so it can carry out ‘targeted disruptions’ against hackers
item.dc:creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
item.description: Experts applauded the proposed change, which would require ransomware victims to notify authorities when paying a hacker's ransom, arguing that this information can help catch cybercriminals and stop their activities.

item.title: National security meets next-gen tech at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025’s AI Defense panel
item.dc:creator: TechCrunch Events
item.description: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 runs October 27-29 at Moscone West in San Francisco. Join 10,000+ startup and VC leaders for three days of conversations and connections that define what’s next.

item.title: User privacy app Cloaked adds AI-powered caller screening
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: Cloaked is releasing a new call guard feature to let an AI-powered bot chat to scammers on a user's behalf.

item.title: Google, Microsoft say Chinese hackers are exploiting SharePoint zero-day
item.dc:creator: Zack Whittaker
item.description: The tech giants have evidence that Chinese hackers are exploiting the new bug, but warned "multiple actors" are also hacking into affected SharePoint systems.

item.title: Onstage at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: How AI is forcing late-stage startups to rewire GTM — or be left behind
item.dc:creator: TechCrunch Events
item.description: AI isn’t just disrupting products — it’s upending how companies sell, scale, and succeed. At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, happening October 27-29 in San Francisco, we’re diving deep into how late-stage startups are navigating this shift.

item.title: VSCO’s iPhone camera app is now available globally
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: Photo editing and sharing app VSCO is making its iOS camera app, Capture, available across the world, following a limited launch in June, when the app came to Ireland, Australia, and New Zealand.

item.title: 21-year-old MIT dropouts raise $32M at $300M valuation led by Insight
item.dc:creator: Tage Kene-Okafor
item.description: Karun Kaushik and Selin Kocalar weren’t planning to raise a Series A so soon for their startup Delve. But inbound interest started rolling in, and the startup recently closed a $32 million Series A at a $300 million valuation.
